Author: TusharMali99
Title: Bitcoin
Body: PlanEx is a global decentralized stock exchange on which any stock change assets are available to be acquired.  1. The platform is based on blockchain technology and smart-contracts. All of the financial instruments are led to a single standard and traded on the single platform. 2. PlanEx lets all of the market participants to get an access to assets from all over the world that are being traded on market: assets, bonds, Eurobonds, ETF etc. 3. The platform currently converts assets of real market to crypto-tokens (unified standard XPX) and conversely, without any constraints. 4. Blockchain technology provides the maximum transparency and safety for  all transactions. 5. Low transactions cost and direct exchange between asset pairs. 6. Significant cost reduction of primary allocation of assets on stock exchange for every market participates.

Author: Rauf_PlanEx
Title: Bitcoin
Body: Using Motivation  1. Funds, issuers, central depositories of countries with the help of PlanEx get the access to global investor audience with no restrictions.  2. Traders get the single stock exchange with all of the instruments, low commission and the opportunity to trade without intermediate conversion to the cache such as AAPL/BTC.  3. The companies that plan to issue securities get the opportunity to place securities without huge expenses that are being imposed by regulator stock exchanges and auditors. There are no restrictions neither to the size of the business nor to the geographical placement.  4. Investors, law firms, private individuals, banks get the access to variety of algorithmic strategies that used to be unavailable because of the high entry threshold in hedge funds.  5. All of the market participants get higher profitability due to the erasure of intermediaries and extra commissions which used to be available to big investors only.

Author: Jack_Cript_14674
Title: Bitcoin
Body: The main advantage of the conversion of financial assets into crypto assets is the consolidation of assets from separate exchanges, simplification and cheapening of trading procedures, registration and the ability to work with all assets in one place, rather than on 200 exchanges of different jurisdictions.

Author: Jack_Cript_14674
Title: Bitcoin
Body: And another advantage of our platform is to provide all the returns of the best algorithmic funds.  At the first stage - IT is possible through the yield PROXY with their trading in the classical markets, then at the stage of the exchange implementation, hedge funds can work directly in the crypto-currency field and generate returns directly on the platform without entering the classical assets.

Author: Rauf_PlanEx
Title: Bitcoin
Body: Platform represents a multilayered system that consolidates two markets – real assets and crypto-currencies.  Side-chain approach gives an opportunity to use the benefits of classic blockchain bypassing the commonly-used but slow chain thereby scaling computing, that decreases the cost and speeds up transactions.  Ensuring the requirements of cost, speed and security of transactions on leger it’s necessary to move on to side chain concept. That is why in our solution we will use Lightning Network for performing transactions of Bitcoin Network and Raiden Network, solution for working with Ethereum network.  United Lightning and Raiden will give the opportunity to perform atomic exchange operations between Bitcoin and Ethereum Token ERC-20(827).  Token of the system will be realized with the use of improvement suggestions (ERC-827), that adds extra functions: return of randomly sent tokens, double gas economy and support for the transfer of additional data.

Title: Bitcoin
Body: PlanEx Ecosystem becoming very interesting for a lots of investors and partners. We are pleased to announce that, during the May of 2018 we got new investors and partners such as Da Vinci Capital, ITI capital, Crypto Global Capital.  Da Vinci Capital (http://dvcap.com) specializes in direct investments in promising companies in Russia and other countries of the Eurasian Economic Union. Da Vinci Capital manages several funds with total funds of more than $ 300 million. Da Vinci Capital's portfolio includes IT companies Sofline, EPAM Systems, ITinvest and others.  Crypto Global Capital (https://cryptoglobalcapital.com) invest in top Pre-ICO companies that have gone through a thorough and exhaustive due diligence process. Author: Rinat_Amsterdam
Title: Bitcoin
Body: Token XPX is a fundamental part of the PlanEx ecosystem and a tokenization tool.  ✓ 30% of all trading commissions will be distributed among XPX token holders on a daily basis. The more XPX tokens you have, the more revenue you earn.  For example: user Alice owns 1000000 XPX. Say the total daily trading volume in our network is 100,000 BTC, the trading Commission of the PlanEx platform will be 100 BTC. So, Alice will get a 0.1 BTC a day. Annual return of Alice will be of 36.5 BTC.  ✓ Periodically, on the platform, among the holders of the tokens, airdrops of new asset allocations will be conducted.  ✓ Participants performing arbitration and market maker's functions will receive a reward.  ✓ Funds and asset management. The PlanEx environment receives 30% of the funds' payments, the holders of the tokens receive 25% of this amount on a weekly basis.

Naviin Kapoor, a blockchain & ICO consultant, and a business transformation leader with more than eleven and half years of experience in project management and business analysis and more than one year of experience in ethereum, bitcoin, hyper ledger, EOS, consensus protocol and distributed/shared ledger technology. He has also attained various industry certifications such as PMP, CBAP, ITIL, PSM 1 & CSM.  He had worked on various banking transformation projects – “sustainable and disruption”, which were initiated in various domains such as Retail Banking, Cash Management, Integrated Liquidity Management (ILM), Corporate Banking, Asset & Wealth Management, Financial Messaging, Regulatory Sanctions Filtering and Local and International Payment Systems. Body: Platform represents a multilayered system that consolidates two markets – real assets and crypto-currencies.  Side-chain approach gives an opportunity to use the benefits of classic blockchain bypassing the commonly-used but slow chain thereby scaling computing, that decreases the cost and speeds up transactions.  Ensuring the requirements of cost, speed and security of transactions on leger it’s necessary to move on to side chain concept. That is why in our solution we will use Lightning Network for performing transactions of Bitcoin Network and Raiden Network, solution for working with Ethereum network.  United Lightning and Raiden will give the opportunity to perform atomic exchange operations between Bitcoin and Ethereum Token ERC-20(827).  Token of the system will be realized with the use of improvement suggestions (ERC-827), that adds extra functions: return of randomly sent tokens, double gas economy and support for the transfer of additional data.

Author: Rauf_PlanEx
Title: Bitcoin
Body: New Advisor in PlanEx!  Mr. Yakovlev is an international business executive with over 20 years’ experience acquired in international banks and brokerages. He holds a Masters’ degree in International Banking and Finance, from Moscow State University of International Relations. From 2004 to 2007 Mr. Yakovlev headed Equity Finance and Structured Products of Renaissance Capital and was a a CEO of Renaissance Broker. In 2008 Mr. Yakovlev was one of the founders of Da Vinci Capital and a co-manager of Da Vinci CIS Special Opportunities Fund. Between 2009 and 2014, Mr. Yakovlev was running Structured Products desk in Renaissance Wealth Management, CEO of Renaissance Asset Management, Russia and later on was an Investment Director of Renaissance Real Estate. Since 2015, Mr. Yakovlev is running Trading Desk of ITI Capital responsible for equity, fixed income, derivatives and financing businesses. Mr. Yakovlev also serves as director of ITI Funds UCITS ETF in Luxembourg.

Author: kalunomics
Title: Bitcoin
Body: The side-chain technology bypasses commonly used but slow chain and chooses any blockchain with low transaction queues thereby scaling computing? That is a very good feature considering the fact that cryptocurrency blockchain can only process few transactions per second when compared to services like Visa. 1% of the total supply earmarked for bounty? I doubt if the senior members of the forum will participate in the bounty campaign especially the Bitcointalk Signature campaign. The allocation is too small in my opinion, except maybe you have a huge amount of money reserved for coinmarkcap and other cryptocurrency website ad campaigns.

Title: Bitcoin
Body: Hi all! Good news!  Naviin Kapoor → New advisor in Planex!  Naviin Kapoor, a blockchain & ICO consultant, and a business transformation leader with more than eleven and half years of experience in project management and business analysis and more than one year of experience in ethereum, bitcoin, hyper ledger, EOS, consensus protocol and distributed/shared ledger technology. He has also attained various industry certifications such as PMP, CBAP, ITIL, PSM 1 & CSM.  He had worked on various banking transformation projects – “sustainable and disruption”, which were initiated in various domains such as Retail Banking, Cash Management, Integrated Liquidity Management (ILM), Corporate Banking, Asset & Wealth Management, Financial Messaging, Regulatory Sanctions Filtering and Local and International Payment Systems. Author: Rauf_PlanEx
Title: Bitcoin
Body: Hi, all!  Token XPX is a fundamental part of the PlanEx ecosystem and a tokenization tool.  ✓ 30% of all trading commissions will be distributed among XPX token holders on a daily basis. The more XPX tokens you have, the more revenue you earn.  For example: user Alice owns 1000000 XPX. Say the total daily trading volume in our network is 100,000 BTC, the trading Commission of the PlanEx platform will be 100 BTC. So, Alice will get a 0.1 BTC a day. Annual return of Alice will be of 36.5 BTC.  ✓ Periodically, on the platform, among the holders of the tokens, airdrops of new asset allocations will be conducted.  ✓ Participants performing arbitration and market maker's functions will receive a reward.  ✓ Funds and asset management. The PlanEx environment receives 30% of the funds' payments, the holders of the tokens receive 25% of this amount on a weekly basis.

Author: Rinat_Amsterdam
Title: Bitcoin
Body: PlanEx Ecosystem becoming very interesting for a lots of investors and partners. We are pleased to announce that, during the May of 2018 we got new investors and partners such as Da Vinci Capital, ITI capital, Crypto Global Capital.  Da Vinci Capital (http://dvcap.com) specializes in direct investments in promising companies in Russia and other countries of the Eurasian Economic Union. Da Vinci Capital manages several funds with total funds of more than $ 300 million. Da Vinci Capital's portfolio includes IT companies Sofline, EPAM Systems, ITinvest and others.  Crypto Global Capital (https://cryptoglobalcapital.com) invest in top Pre-ICO companies that have gone through a thorough and exhaustive due diligence process.  ITI Capital is an investment financial company, one of the top 5 largest investment companies in Russia in terms of turnover on the Moscow stock exchange. — Become one of the first to be an investor/partner of Planex on special terms → https://planex.io/
